document_data.name: ''Rod of Auglad''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Rod of Auglad''''' was a fabled possession of [[Ilitmur Auglad]]. As of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], it had yet to be found.{{cite book/Serpent Kingdoms|126}}
document_data.Rumors: The ''Rod'' was believed to have been hidden somewhere in [[Procalith]] by the [[Magister]] [[Nasana Melnuthquel]], who had once been the lover of [[Ilitmur Auglad]]. Many adventurers had searched through the ruins of Procalith looking for it.{{cite book/Serpent Kingdoms|103}}
